snippet: While cross-examining the athlete Oscar Pistorius, on trial for his girlfriend’s death, the prosecutor displayed a photograph of her bloodied head and all but ordered the defendant to look.
abstract: Gerrie Nel, prosecutor in murder trial of Oscar Pistorius, is relentless in cross-examining Pistorius about fatal shooting of Reeva Steenkamp; Nel, who has a reputation for combativeness and a string of high-profile victories under his belt, all but orders Pistorius to look at gruesome photograph of the victim, drawing gasps from the courtroom.

byline.contributor: Alan Cowell contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: While cross-examining the athlete Oscar Pistorius, on trial for his girlfriend’s death, the prosecutor displayed a photograph of her bloodied head and all but ordered the defendant to look.

headline.main: Gasps in Court as Prosecution Prods Pistorius
headline.print_headline: Gasps in Court as Prosecution Prods Pistorius
